oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Music on the Rise with Robert Gordon
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Split Fountain Printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black and split fountain, red to yellow, on cream white) announcing Music on the Rise with Robert Gordon and the DC All Stars at the State Theater on October 7. Poster features a woodcut of a guitar.
